title: Bug 116829 - Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: When modifying the font size of a label, the label's height does not immediately change to reflect the new font size.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Set the font size of a label in the UI.
2. Observe that the label's height remains unchanged.
3.
OB: The label's height does not change right after modifying its font size in the UI.
EB: After changing the font size of the label, the label's height should be adjusted accordingly.
SR: The label's height should update automatically when the font size is modified.
